title: I love Blind Pick!
body:
I love Blind Pick!
I love never getting my role!
I love never being able to practice the champion I want!
I love the fact that I have to go to ranked for new champ select!
I love how Riot basically ignores OCE!
I love how they think our community is too small but not small enough for ranked!
I love how all I get is Support!
I absolutely LOVE THIS!

(p.s I kinda get why but it's still frustrating and Riot just seems to ignore us or dance around the topic.)

replies.body:
i love how you think blind pick > ranked

also riot doesn't ignore oce are you blind?

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i3J2E2n1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-22T00:21:26.740+0000)
>
> i love how you think blind pick > ranked
> 
> also riot doesn't ignore oce are you blind?

Well I'd rather not play Ranked if the option is there
as for riot ignoring us I understand they don't, this little post was more spur of the moment rage then much else.
